description: Jasmine met Lief and Barda in the Forests of Silence, where she helped them find the first gem and joined them on their quest. Jasmine`s a smart, sassy orphan who has a strong link to the trees and animals she grew up with. She`s used to being on her own - but she`s always had her friends Kree the raven and little furry Filli.
name: Jasmine
